body.name: WIFI Security Camera for Home Surveillance,Indoor House Camera for Baby Monitor, 24/7 Video/Audio SD Card Recording,Cloud Storage,2-Way Audio,AI Detection,Night Vision,Alexa&Google Assistant Support
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 9 mins
features: 💻【 Enhanced Privacy Mode & Monitor 16 Cameras Simultaneously 】Remote access to indoor camera wireless with phone app,you can setup the amorom camera as dog camera,cat camera or other pet camera,and you can monitor all these pets camera with phone app and PC Web,it can display 16 surveillance & security cameras simultaneously.The most important is that the Amorom camera adopted an advanced privacy mode, which can stop audio and video recording via the phone app without unplugging.

👍【Convenient Voice Control via Alexa/Google Device】With our wireless camera, you can easily control it using voice commands through your Alexa or Google device. Simply say "Alexa, show me the baby camera" and the Echo Show will instantly display the live feed from the baby room.

🔊【Crystal Night Vision & 2-Way Talk】camaras de seguridad inalambricas provides exceptional 1080P crystal-clear night vision, ensuring that you capture high-quality images even in low-light conditions. Furthermore, our wireless indoor security camera features two-way audio functionality, allowing you to communicate with your family members at any time.

🏃【Intelligent Motion Detection & Instant Notifications】Our home security cameras are equipped with advanced motion detection technology that instantly sends real-time alerts to your phone whenever it detects any movement from your baby or pet.With indoor security camera, you can keep a watchful eye on your home,no matter where you are. Amorom security cameras can be easily installed in your apartment to provide efficient protection against intruders, ensuring the safety of your property.

🔰【Secure AWS & Complimentary Local Storage Assistance】Our indoor camera features state-of-the-art bank-grade encryption technology, ensuring your data is safeguarded on our secure US cloud server. Rest assured that even in the unlikely event of theft, your privacy will remain intact. Additionally, this camaras de seguridad para casa offers free local storage support via a Micro SD Card (up to 128G, not included), allowing you to store footage conveniently and securely.

Why can't connect to your wifi ? Amorom Camera only supports 2.4G WIFI network (Not 5G wifi). if your wifi router is dual-band wifi router, please check the wifi settings on pc and ensure the 2.4G WIFI Network is enabled. Why the device goes offline after install to other places? The possible reason of offline is power failure or weak and unstable wifi signal. if the power adapter works well, please try to move the wifi router close to installation place, if it works again, the cause is weak or unstable wifi signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Promptly fixed issues
reviews.reviewText: Had issues with the camera connectingbut the company contacted me back right away and fixed the issue for us. Have to fullyconnect it still but the company went beyond what they needed to.After it's connected I will update this :)

reviews.reviewerName: Muy buena realmente para monitor de bebés y la vigilancia es buena el audio es claro Muy buena realmente para monitor de bebés y la vigilancia es buena el audio es claro
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Es muy buena realmente para monitor de bebé y para la vigilancia 🤙🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works ish
reviews.reviewText: Judging from doing the test. The connection took a min to do, worked from second try. But as for picture quality just for monitoring, it's okay. It could definitely be better, it's not like HD picture. Both color and b/w modes. The picture does lag by several seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not stay online
reviews.reviewText: This worked all for about a month. Now it continues to go offline. I have to re boot it and it works all for about 5 minutes and then it’s offline again. It sets literally right next to our router so I know it has great connection. Spend the extra money to get a better camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's very clear and extremely functional

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Camera is perfect but the app is just horrible.
reviews.reviewText: Image quality is amazing for the price. This camera does everything it says it will. Night vision is awesome. But the app to control everything has to be the worst app I have ever interacted with. Not one thing about it is user friendly. And there are no explanations as to what any obscurely named setting might do. And those settings are spread out through 3to four different places across the app. If the camera wasn't way above my expectations I would give no stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of installation
reviews.reviewText: Love the picture quality and two way communication. I got this for my father in law, who is bedridden and suffers from Parkinson and dementia. This helps my mother in law monitor him while in another room. Great product to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It worked ok. Not the best. But it kept making a weird noise until it stopped working.
